onboarding_title: Smart trading. Night interface. Live data.
ai_briefing_intro: Stay ahead with curated intelligence across equities, crypto, FX and commodities.
ai_focus_market_item1: Detect liquidity vacuums and block trades in real time.
ai_focus_market_item2: Track sector rotations with smart heatmaps and flow monitors.
ai_focus_market_item3: Map cross-asset correlations to anticipate volatility spillovers.
ai_focus_market_item4: Surface macro catalysts and earnings surprises minutes after release.
ai_focus_risk_item1: Monitor drawdown and VaR against account thresholds.
ai_focus_risk_item2: Get guardrails for leverage and margin efficiency.
ai_focus_risk_item3: Stress test scenarios across rates, FX and crypto regimes.
ai_focus_risk_item4: Receive nudges when positions deviate from playbooks.
ai_focus_learning_item1: Daily strategy briefs distilled in Arabic and English.
ai_focus_learning_item2: Interactive lessons on options, staking and hedging.
ai_focus_learning_item3: Glossaries and explainers generated from the latest filings.
ai_focus_learning_item4: Gamified quizzes to benchmark mastery over time.
ai_next_step_simulator_desc: Prototype ideas with Monte Carlo and what-if engines.
ai_next_step_lessons_desc: Follow bilingual courses on portfolio construction.
ai_next_step_strategy_desc: Pin AI-suggested trade setups and journals.
ai_next_step_support_desc: Chat with our certified mentors for tailored feedback.
compare_assets_subtitle: Pick up to three tickers to evaluate performance, liquidity and fundamentals.
compare_assets_empty: Choose assets to generate a comparison dashboard.
